searchengine.indexer

Class Indexer

  • java.lang.Object
    • searchengine.indexer.Indexer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IndexerInterface

    public class Indexer
extends java.lang.Object
implements IndexerInterface
    Web-indexing objects. This class implements the Indexer interface using a list-based index structure. A Hash Map based implementation of Indexing
